Class WRenderer

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WRenderer
public class WRenderer extends Object
Class that renders a WMessage (Multi message) for the IRIS WYSIWYG editor.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting (Parts of this class are derived from MultiRenderer, written by Doug Lau.)

    • WRenderer

      public WRenderer(MultiConfig mcfg)
      Create a new MULTI renderer.
      Parameters:
      mcfg - MultiConfig for sign or sign-group.

    • WRenderer

      public WRenderer(MultiConfig mcfg, WEditorErrorManager em)
      Create a new MULTI renderer with an error manager.
      Parameters:
      mcfg - MultiConfig for sign or sign-group.
      em - WRenderErrorManager for collecting errors.

    • renderIrisToken

      public void renderIrisToken(Wt_IrisToken itok)
      Add an Iris-specific token ("action tag") to the current rendering block. To most of the rendering code, this looks like a single, extra-wide, TextChar. (Renders as a solid greenish box.)

    • drawGlyph

      protected boolean drawGlyph(WGlyph wg, int fg, int x, int y)
      Render a glyph onto the raster.
      Parameters:
      wg - WGlyph to render.
      fg - Foreground color.
      x - X-position on raster (1-based)
      y - Y-position on raster (1-based)

    • drawSolidBox

      protected boolean drawSolidBox(int fg, int x, int y, int w, int h)
      Draw a box onto the raster.
      Parameters:
      fg - Box color.
      x - X-position on raster (1-based)
      y - Y-position on raster (1-based)
      w - Width of box
      h - Height of box
